name: Fruit Candy Smash Puzzle
description:
Match 3 fruits of the same colors to make beautiful fruit bomb, and collect the juicy tastes before you run out of moves! Become the most delicious and fruit juicy mania possible in this fruit land

FEATURES:
- Almost 550 deliciously fruity levels
- Fresh and cute fruits
- Swap and blast your way through ever expanding new worlds!
- Playing addictive match fruit
- Dozens of boosters
- Play anywhere anytime: Can also be played without WIFI
